varlistentry.term: Global gpiod_ctxless_event_loop (const char *device, unsigned int offset, bool active_low, const char *consumer, const struct timespec *timeout, gpiod_ctxless_event_poll_cb poll_cb, gpiod_ctxless_event_handle_cb event_cb, void *data) GPIOD_API GPIOD_DEPRECATED

listitem.para: This function suffers from an issue where HW may not allow setting up both rising and falling egde interrupts at the same time.

varlistentry.term: Global gpiod_ctxless_event_loop_multiple (const char *device, const unsigned int *offsets, unsigned int num_lines, bool active_low, const char *consumer, const struct timespec *timeout, gpiod_ctxless_event_poll_cb poll_cb, gpiod_ctxless_event_handle_cb event_cb, void *data) GPIOD_API GPIOD_DEPRECATED

listitem.para: This function suffers from an issue where HW may not allow setting up both rising and falling egde interrupts at the same time.
This mechanism no longer exists in the library and this function does nothing.
